de.richsource.gradle.plugins.gwt

Class AbstractGwtTask

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gradle.api.internal.AbstractTask
      • org.gradle.api.DefaultTask
        • de.richsource.gradle.plugins.gwt.AbstractGwtActionTask
          • de.richsource.gradle.plugins.gwt.AbstractGwtTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Comparable<Task>, org.gradle.api.internal.DynamicObjectAware, org.gradle.api.internal.TaskInternal, ExtensionAware, Task, org.gradle.util.Configurable<Task>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractGwtCompile, GwtDev

    public abstract class AbstractGwtTask
extends AbstractGwtActionTask
    Base class for several GWT related tasks that share specific parameters.
